Ha-ha, happened to me also. But I used spawn marker and everything is fixed.

Here is what you will do.

\*Open Ctrl+K, and a menu will appear. Click on local instances, and you will find the LC-41 pad option. Click on it, you will find a menu with details of the pad. Copy the position. Close everything, except the game.

\*Again open Ctrl+k, and click on spawn new and find for spawn marker. Click on it as soon as you find it. Click on paste position. Save the marker as a launch site. Try moving it down little to fit your rockets in the pad.

\*Use launch clamps, outerwise you rocket will start jumping

Hope this helps!
